dublin_core.dcvalue: Mobile for Development Impact site offers data analysis and insights on mobile in emerging markets to inform investment and design decisions and to support digital inclusion Information includes An overview of which network operators are active in a country and network coverage 2G 3G or 4G where available Details of Mobile for Development products and services within each country Ground breaking research and analysis National statistics taken from leading development organisations to clarify the social needs in a market Information about Mobile for Development industry events The site has been designed to serve Mobile operators who want to build stronger business cases for services in emerging markets Entrepreneurs who want to identify new business opportunities Investors who would like to identify potential investments Development organisations aiming to gain insight into best practices and to demonstrate the social and economic impact of mobile Governments and regulators wishing to understand key sector trends and benchmark against other countries Academics looking to access data and analysis for research
